alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. John The Baptist, Ascension, St. James, southeastern Iberville and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Donaldsonville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Gramercy, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, Paincourtville, Convent, North Vacherie, Wallace, Supreme, Belle Rose, Labadieville, Garyville and Edgard. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 177 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Western Ascension
